name: Chatty
description:
Chatty is a tiny VN engine designed to make quick conversations between characters. Somewhere between objection.lol and Ren'py.

Currently Chatty is in EXTREMELY EARLY DEVELOPMENT. Little is documented and things are likely to break!

To create your own dialogues, edit the contents of the 'project' folder. The engine ships with a short interaction between the robot duo JNFR and Ru-B.

Check here for the documentation
